name: fetch! (itch) (MangoFish)
description:
fetch!

 A puzzle game where you pick and set in your movement commands before starting a level. 

There are 4 directional slots where you will choose your movement commands.

 Lock it in and watch the dog fetch the grenade to complete the level! 

Currently 27 levels

Credits

  • friendly scribbles font by @kmlgames (https://kmlgames.itch.io/friendly-scribbles)
  • monogram font by datagoblin (https://datagoblin.itch.io/monogram)
  • Music by Jordan Ottesen (https://jottesen.itch.io/loopable-video-game-music)
  • Sound effects from jsfxr (https://sfxr.me/)
